actions.name: Steam Engine

cost.trigger: The user is hit by a Water- or Fire-Type attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by a Water- or Fire-Type attack.

Effect: The user's SPD Stage increases by +3 for 5 Activations.
